Text:
Whenever someone talks about "the" mystery behind cancer or "a" cure for cancer you know they are full of shit. Which KIND of cancer? There are many, many kinds and many, many causes.

People ask what it hurts to believe things without proof like religion, mysticism, homeopathy, anti-vaccination claims, and chiropractic hogwash. Well, here's your answer. People waste critical time they could have used to get real medical attention on magical non-sense like this and they die because of it.
